trans-unit.source: Represents a service description format extension applied to an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> when an XML Web service supports the SOAP protocol version 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 表示當 XML Web Service 支援 SOAP 通訊協定 1.2 版時，<see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> 所套用的服務描述格式延伸。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies how messages, either abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions, appear within the `<Body>` element of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會指定如何抽象型別定義或實體的結構描述定義的訊息出現在`<Body>`SOAP 訊息的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Soap12BodyBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Soap12BodyBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。
